attributes.action: Postland Train Station signal box is restored and given listed status.
attributes.additional_details: Being next to a main road it may come to life that the Highways will demolish the building. I believe this should not happen as these old signal boxes are a part of our history and played a big role in our countries economic growth.
attributes.background: Postland Train station is a now disused station in southern Lincolnshire. The station is now multiple houses but the signal box is now derelict after years of disrepair.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of Historic England and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about the process of listing buildings and suggest a building for listing here:

https://historicengland.org.uk/listing/
